contextId.information: This can be stated in active form. Possible meanings are AT: 1) "God chose me to defend the gospel" or 2) "I am in prison because I defend the gospel." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: I am put here for the defense of the gospel

contextId.information: This can be stated in active form. AT: "A priest circumcised me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

Possible meanings are 1) Paul wants Christ to change him so that he can die as Christ died or 2) he wants his desire to sin to become as dead as Jesus was before he was raised. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: I want to be transformed into the likeness of his death
